prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Pipe, Brass, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Bass, Pipe, Brass, Synth Pad, Drums, and Piano, but without Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Bass, Pipe, Brass, Synth Pad, Drums,
